statements: SELECT * FROM course_payments WHERE payment_status = 'Approved';
SELECT course_id, amount FROM course_payments WHERE payment_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM course_payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM course_payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND payment_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT course_id, payment_date, payment_status FROM course_payments WHERE payment_id = 5;
SELECT payment_id, course_id, amount, payment_date, payment_status FROM course_payments WHERE payment_status = 'Completed';
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date, payment_status, course_id FROM course_payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_id, payment_status, payment_date, amount, payment_id FROM course_payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT payment_status, course_id, payment_date, payment_id, amount FROM course_payments WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM course_payments WHERE payment_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_enrollments
SELECT enrollment_id, student_id, enrollment_date FROM course_enrollments
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card'
SELECT enrollment_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100
SELECT * FROM course_enrollments ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM course_enrollments WHERE enrollment_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM course_enrollments WHERE payment_status = 'Paid' ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;

SELECT ce.enrollment_id, ce.course_id, t.transaction_date, t.amount FROM course_enrollments ce INNER JOIN transactions t ON ce.enrollment_id = t.enrollment_id WHERE t.amount > 100 ORDER BY t.amount DESC;

SELECT ce.student_id, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM course_enrollments ce LEFT JOIN transactions t ON ce.enrollment_id = t.enrollment_id GROUP BY ce.student_id HAVING total_transactions >= 5;
SELECT ce.course_id, SUM(t.amount) AS total_amount FROM course_enrollments ce LEFT JOIN transactions t ON ce.enrollment_id = t.enrollment_id GROUP BY ce.course_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM course_enrollment;
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM course_enrollment WHERE enrollment_date = '2021-10-01';
SELECT enrollment_id, student_id, course_id FROM course_enrollment WHERE student_id = 101 ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_method FROM payment_information WHERE payment_date >= '2021-10-01';
SELECT transaction_id, payment_id, status FROM transaction_processing WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM course_enrollment WHERE student_id = 100 ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT course_id, enrollment_date FROM course_enrollment WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01' AND enrollment_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, amount FROM payment_information WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY payment_date;
SELECT * FROM transaction_processing WHERE status IN ('Pending', 'Processing') ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT course_id, enrollment_date FROM course_enrollment WHERE student_id = 200 AND enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM course_enrollments;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT enrollment_id, course_id, student_id FROM course_enrollments ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Refund'
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, email FROM students WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT student_id, student_name, email, phone_number FROM students WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM course_enrollments WHERE enrollment_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;

SELECT s.student_name, c.course_id FROM students s JOIN course_enrollments ce ON s.student_id = ce.student_id JOIN payments p ON ce.enrollment_id = p.enrollment_id JOIN transactions t ON p.payment_id = t.payment_id WHERE t.transaction_type = 'payment';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, email FROM Students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_id FROM Courses WHERE instructor_id = 2;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT enrollment_id, student_id, enrollment_date FROM CourseEnrollments WHERE payment_status = 'Paid';
SELECT * FROM CourseEnrollments WHERE payment_status = 'Paid';
SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) AS enrollments FROM CourseEnrollments ce JOIN Courses c ON ce.course_id = c.course_id GROUP BY course_name;
SELECT student_id, student_name, email, course_name FROM Students s JOIN CourseEnrollments ce ON s.student_id = ce.student_id JOIN Courses c ON ce.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT instructor_name, specialization, COUNT(*) AS courses_taught FROM Instructors i JOIN Courses c ON i.instructor_id = c.instructor_id GROUP BY instructor_name, specialization;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
